review.title: Causal Discovery from Changes
review.abstract: we propose a new method equivalent of jointly discovering causal structures, based on the detection of local, spontaneous changes in rendering the mathematical underlying data - generating model. we analyze the classes of structures that are equivalent relative normal to a stream of distributions produced regularly by simple local changes, and devise algorithms that output graphical representations of these equivalence classes. we present experimental results, using simulated data, and examine the errors associated with detection of changes and recovery of known structures.
histories: Appears in Proceedings of the Seventeenth Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (UAI2001)
